title: National Assembly session starts
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 09 (APP):The National Assembly session on Wednesday started at 04:15 p.m. with the recitation of the Holy Quran, Naat and National Anthem.
Deputy Speaker National Assembly Ghulam Mustafa Shah chairs the session.
The House would take up agenda items including Questions, Calling Attention Notices, Introduction of Bills, Legislative Business, Motions, Resolutions, Motion under Rule 259 and matters other than Points of Order.
